nbttag: {"id":"minecraft:enchanted_book","count":1,"components":{"minecraft:custom_name":"{\"text\":\"Enchanted Book\",\"color\":\"white\"}","minecraft:lore":["{\"text\":\"Dragon Tracer I\",\"color\":\"blue\"}","{\"text\":\"Arrows home towards dragons if\",\"color\":\"gray\"}","{\"text\":\"\",\"extra\":[{\"text\":\"they are within \",\"color\":\"gray\"},{\"text\":\"2 \",\"color\":\"green\"},{\"text\":\"blocks.\",\"color\":\"gray\"}]}","{\"text\":\"\"}","{\"text\":\"Use this on an item in an Anvil\",\"color\":\"gray\"}","{\"text\":\"to apply it!\",\"color\":\"gray\"}","{\"text\":\"\"}","{\"text\":\"Source:\",\"color\":\"gold\"}","{\"text\":\"\",\"extra\":[{\"text\":\"I-V: \",\"color\":\"green\"},{\"text\":\"Enchantment Table,\",\"color\":\"gray\"}]}","{\"text\":\"Feather Collection\",\"color\":\"gray\"}","{\"text\":\"\"}","{\"text\":\"Applied To:\",\"color\":\"gold\"}","{\"text\":\"\",\"extra\":[{\"text\":\"- \",\"color\":\"gray\"},{\"text\":\"Bow\",\"color\":\"white\"}]}","{\"text\":\"\"}","{\"text\":\"COMMON\",\"color\":\"white\",\"bold\":true}"]}}
